caption.title: Relationships between wetland drying frequency over the period (1984â€“2011) and 1984 data and several predictors.
caption.p: % glacier cover in the catchment (A), wetland area (B) and wetland shape index (C), based on 423 wetlands in the Cordillera Real, Bolivia. Data are fitted with linear models. Dotted lines indicate 95% confidence intervals.
